game.name: The Beauty's Plan -  Sword Shield
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A third-person perspective roguelike action game: select your favorite combinations from dozens of skills to defeat dozens of enemy types and bosses, and obtain a variety of powerful items.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A third-person perspective roguelike action game: select your favorite combinations from dozens of skills to defeat dozens of enemy types and bosses, and obtain a variety of powerful items.
